name: SMS Sentiment Analysis with Nexmo & Google Cloud Sentiment Analysis
description: Example using Google Cloud Sentiment Analysis to analyze SMS messages and determine the sentiment of the text.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: The client_email property from your google_creds.json file.

GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private_key property from your google_creds.json file. Make sure to copy and paste everything here.
